verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <S%H3050><s%> yah ye the LORD הַ֭לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu Praise עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei O ye servants יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD הַֽ֝לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> ye-Hi become שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem be the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD מְבֹרָ֑ךְ <S%H1288><s%> me-vo-Rach; Blessed מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> me-'at-Tah, from this time forth וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- and for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. evermore

מִמִּזְרַח־ <S%H4217><s%> mi-miz-rach- From the rising שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> She-mesh of the sun עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- to its מְבוֹא֑וֹ <S%H3996><s%> me-vo-'O; unto the going down מְ֝הֻלָּ֗ל <S%H1984><s%> me-hul-Lal, [is] to be praised שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the same the LORD'S

רָ֖ם <S%H7311><s%> ram [is] high עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all גּוֹיִ֥ם׀ <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim above all nations יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; The LORD עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al is above הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim above the heavens כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-Do. [and] his glory

מִ֭י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who כַּיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Who [is] like unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God הַֽמַּגְבִּיהִ֥י <S%H1361><s%> ham-mag-bi-Hi on high לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ <S%H3427><s%> la-Sha-vet. who dwelleth

הַֽמַּשְׁפִּילִ֥י <S%H8213><s%> ham-mash-pi-Li Who humbleth לִרְא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot; [himself] to behold בַּשָּׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> bash-sha-Ma-yim [the things that are] in heaven וּבָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> u-va-'A-retz. and in the earth

מְקִֽימִ֣י <S%H6965><s%> me-ki-Mi He raiseth up מֵעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> me-'a-Far out of the dust דָּ֑ל <S%H1800><s%> Dal; the poor מֵֽ֝אַשְׁפֹּ֗ת <S%H830><s%> me-'ash-Pot, out of the dunghill יָרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> ya-Rim [and] lifteth אֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H34><s%> ev-Yon. the needy

לְהוֹשִׁיבִ֥י <S%H3427><s%> le-ho-shi-Vi That he may set עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with נְדִיבִ֑ים <S%H5081><s%> ne-di-Vim; [him] with princes עִ֝֗ם <S%H5973><s%> 'Im, With נְדִיבֵ֥י <S%H5081><s%> ne-di-Vei [even] with the princes עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo. of his people

מֽוֹשִׁיבִ֨י׀ <S%H3427><s%> mo-shi-Vi to keep עֲקֶ֬רֶת <S%H6135><s%> 'a-Ke-ret He maketh the barren woman הַבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit, house אֵֽם־ <S%H517><s%> 'em- mother הַבָּנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> hab-ba-Nim of children שְׂמֵחָ֗ה <S%H8056><s%> se-me-Chah, [and to be] a joyful הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> Yah. ye the LORD
